page.title: 14THE COLLINS FAMILY
page.content: The Collins family who live at Chy Billy are the{national family darts } {champions}of Britain.They are closely related and find it very difficult to find good opponents.They play for the Gweek Social Club Darts Team.The men play every Friday and the women play every Wednesday.There are four men and five women.They started playing in 1964 and have won{130 trophies}which fill their living room. They also enter enormous vegetables for local shows and have won a{bronze} {medal in horticulture.}They gave us a tip for growing very long leeks. First dig a trench and put a couple of centimeters of{coal dust}in the bottom.Then you put the leeks in and water them. The Collins family get their water by pumping it up from a{bore hole}which is in their{back garden. }
